p: The antimicrobial activity of Camellia species extracts was mainly explored against human pathogens. A single study was found in literature that reports the activity of green tea extracts in Pseudomonas syringae pv. actinidiae (Psa), the agent that causes kiwifruit bacterial cancer [ 76]. The results showed that tea extracts strongly inhibited Psa growth and swimming motility. Also, a significant loss of virulence was observed after tea extract treatment.
